title: 89/669/EEC: Council Decision of 24 July 1989 concerning the provisional application of the Agreed Minutes amending the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Republic of India on trade in textile products
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 24 July 1989 concerning the provisional application of the Agreed Minutes amending the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Republic of India on trade in textile products (89/669/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Pending the completion of the procedures necessary for its conclusion, the Agreed Minutes amending the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Republic of India on trade in textile products shall be applied provisionally in  the Community, with effect from 1 January 1988, provided that there is reciprocal provisional application on the part of the Republic of India.
The text of the Agreed Minutes is attached to this Decision.

The Commission is invited to seek the agreement of the Government of the Republic of India on the provisional application of the Agreed Minutes referred to in Article 1 and to notify the Council thereof.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 July 1989.
For the Council
The President
H. NALLET
(1) OJ No L 267, 27. 9. 1988, p. 1.
